name: fullstack-challenge
description: The Boxscore is the goto widget on any sports site to get quick information about a game.  ESPN, Fox Sports, theScore, and many others have solutions.

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "cd boxscore && npm run-script cold-start" "cd api && npm run-script cold-start"
scripts.warm-start: concurrently --kill-others "cd boxscore && npm start" "cd api && npm start"
